languages.text: "После //ограничения в служении//частичного выведения из командной цепи// архимагоса Амарната проповеди о Прерывании Цикла распространялись по флоту Осознание, маркированные этим автором".

"Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."
languages.original_text: "После //ограничения в служении//частичного выведения из командной цепи// архимагоса Амарната проповеди о Прерывании Цикла распространялись по флоту Осознание, маркированные этим автором".

traits.locale_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on discontinuing the Cycle which were passed around in the Cognisance Fleet."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

languages.text: 「その後、大賢人アマルナトの部分的な//聖職者としての権利剥奪//指揮系統からの離脱//が起きた。アマルナととはコグニサンス艦隊の間で広まっていた『サイクルを断ち切る』という説教をした者である」
languages.original_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: 「その後、大賢人アマルナトの部分的な//聖職者としての権利剥奪//指揮系統からの離脱//が起きた。アマルナととはコグニサンス艦隊の間で広まっていた『サイクルを断ち切る』という説教をした者である」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “由于阿玛纳特大贤者的部分内容//经过删减//从指挥链中移除//，某位不为人知的作者以这样的署名，进行了一系列关于终止循环的布道，这些布道在真理开拓者舰队中广为流传。”
languages.original_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: “由于阿玛纳特大贤者的部分内容//经过删减//从指挥链中移除//，某位不为人知的作者以这样的署名，进行了一系列关于终止循环的布道，这些布道在真理开拓者舰队中广为流传。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Nach der partiellen //Laizisierung//Entfernung aus der Befehlskette// von Erzmagos Amarnat war das die Zusprechung der Autorenschaft für eine Reihe von Predigten über den Abbruch des Zyklus, die in der Erkenntnisflotte verbreitet wurden."
languages.original_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: "Nach der partiellen //Laizisierung//Entfernung aus der Befehlskette// von Erzmagos Amarnat war das die Zusprechung der Autorenschaft für eine Reihe von Predigten über den Abbruch des Zyklus, die in der Erkenntnisflotte die Runde machten."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Suite //à la laïcisation tendancieuse//au retrait de l'archimagos Amarnat de la chaîne de commandement//, il s'est vu imputer sous ce nom la paternité d'une série de sermons en faveur d'une rupture avec le cycle diffusés à travers la Flotte de la Connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: « Suite //à la laïcisation tendancieuse//au retrait de l'archimagos Amarnat de la chaîne de commandement//, il s'est vu imputé sous ce nom la paternité d'une série de sermons en faveur d'une rupture avec le cycle diffusés à travers la Flotte de la Connaissance. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «A raíz de la //laicización//expulsión de la cadena de mando// del Archimagos Amarnat, esa fue la autoría que se atribuyó a una serie de sermones sobre la interrupción del Ciclo que se divulgaron por toda la Flota Conciencia».
languages.original_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: «A raíz de la //laicización//expulsión de la cadena de mando// del archimagos Amarnat, esa fue la autoría que se atribuyó a una serie de sermones sobre la interrupción del Ciclo que se divulgaron por toda la Flota Conciencia».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Başmagos Amarnat'ın kısmen //laikleşmesinin//emir komuta zincirinden çıkarılmasının// ardından Malumat Filosu arasında yayılan Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu konulu bir dizi vaazın yazarının ismiydi bu."
languages.original_text: "Following Archmagos Amarnat's partial //laicisation//removal from the chain of command//, that was the authorship attribution on a series of sermons on Discontinuing the Cycle that were disseminated across the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: "Başmagos Amarnat'ın kısmen //laikleşmesinin//emir komuta zincirinden çıkarılmasının// ardından Döngü'nün devamsızlığı üzerine verdiği ve Malumat Filosu'nda yaygınlaşan bir dizi vaazının üzerindeki yazar ismi buydu."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
